conversations.question: How many free dental check-ups and cleanings am I entitled to per year?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to free dental check-ups and cleanings twice per year

conversations.question: How long is the wait time for dental check-ups and cleanings?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, wait time for dental check-ups and cleanings is within 48 hours

conversations.question: What is the discount on fillings?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to an 80% discount on fillings, including advanced materials

conversations.question: What is the discount on root canal treatments?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a 70% discount on root canal treatments, including X-rays

conversations.question: What is the discount on crowns and implants?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a 60% discount on crowns and implants, including a 5-year warranty

conversations.question: What is the discount on orthodontic treatment?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a 50% discount on orthodontic treatment, including retention

conversations.question: What is the discount on cosmetic treatments?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a 40% discount on cosmetic treatments, including whitening

conversations.question: How many free dental check-ups and cleanings am I entitled to per year?
conversations.answer: As a Clalit Gold member, you are entitled to free dental check-ups and cleanings every month

conversations.question: Is there an emergency service for dental check-ups and cleanings?
conversations.answer: Yes, as a Clalit Gold member, there is a 24/7 emergency line for dental check-ups and cleanings
